attributes.action: Stop people from selling consoles, accessories, hardware for more than their RRP
attributes.additional_details:
Because people are illegally using bots and are finding ways to avoid tax through their sales as non registered business'
Unfair market for the real world market who wants to own these products.
attributes.background: To stop sites from allowing people to sell products like these over their MSRP, RRP.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Prevent/deter the buying and reselling of goods/services at inflated prices.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561986
